DOC.brief_summary: Investigate efficacy weekly versus daily folic acid supplementation improve folate , vitamin B12 ,
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Weekly Versus Daily Folic Acid Supplementation
DOC.detailed_description: 460 woman rural community western highland Guatemala recruit participation double-blinded study lead Emory University Institute Nutrition Central America Panama ( INCAP ) . The woman randomly assign one 4 vitamin treatment contain different level folic acid , Vitamin B12 , iron zinc . The treatment follow : 1. weekly dose folic acid 5000ug , iron 120 mg , zinc 30mg , B12 16.8 ug ; 2. weekly dose folic acid 2800ug , iron 120mg , zinc 0mg B12 16.8ug ; 3. daily dose folic acid 400ug , iron 60mg , zinc 15mg , B12 2.4ug ; 4. daily dose folic acid 200ug , iron 50mg , zinc 0mg , B12 2.4ug . The woman , age 15-49 , receive vitamin daily 3 month . Anthropometric data blood sample take baseline post-supplementation . The participant also complete series dietary interview baseline post-intervention . No pregnant lactating mother admit study , severely anemic female . Blood sample send National Laboratory Cuernavaca , Mexico , analysis serum folate level .
DOC.criteria: female age 1549 pregnant lactate less 3 month severely anemic
